short_description: fastpath function to generate clustering model using KMeans algorithm.
long_description: fastpath function to generate clustering model containing cluster centroids using KMeans algorithm.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains input data.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains input data.

input_tables.name: InitialCentroidsTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains set of initial centroids.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains set of initial centroids.

output_tables.name: ModelTable
output_tables.rDescription: Specifies the name of the table in which the generated KMeans model can be stored.
output_tables.description: Specifies the name of the table in which the generated KMeans model can be stored.

argument_clauses.name: IdColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the column which is unique identifier of input row.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the column which is unique identifier of input row.

argument_clauses.name: TargetColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the columns/features to be used to cluster the data.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the columns/features to be used to cluster the data.

argument_clauses.name: NumClusters
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the number of clusters to be produced. This argument is not allowed with InitialCentroidsTable provided.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the number of clusters to be produced. This argument is not allowed with InitialCentroidsTable provided.

argument_clauses.name: Seed
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the random seed the algorithm uses for repeatable results. The algorithm uses the seed to randomly sample the input table rows as initial clusters.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the random seed the algorithm uses for repeatable results. The algorithm uses the seed to randomly sample the input table rows as initial clusters.

argument_clauses.name: StopThreshold
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the convergence threshold. When the centroids move by less than this amount, the algorithm has converged.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the convergence threshold. When the centroids move by less than this amount, the algorithm has converged.

argument_clauses.name: MaxIterNum
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the maximum number of iterations that the algorithm runs before quitting if the convergence threshold has not been met.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the maximum number of iterations that the algorithm runs before quitting if the convergence threshold has not been met.

argument_clauses.name: NumInit
argument_clauses.rDescription: The number of times, the k-means algorithm will be run with different initial centroid seeds. The function will emit out the model having the least value of Total Within Cluster Squared Sum.
argument_clauses.description: The number of times, the k-means algorithm will be run with different initial centroid seeds. The function will emit out the model having the least value of Total Within Cluster Squared Sum.

argument_clauses.name: OutputClusterAssignment
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies whether to output Cluster Assignment.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies whether to output Cluster Assignment.

argument_clauses.name: InitialCentroidsMethod
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the initialization method to be used for selecting initial set of centroids.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the initialization method to be used for selecting initial set of centroids.
